name: Fight Game (ManamanTR)
description:
This is a my first playable game.

I made it in a week. It is a fun 2D 2 Player Fighting Game.

Game has some bugs but it isn't a professional game. All of the assets belongs to me.

Controls

Player 1:

A, D = Movement

F = Power

W = Jump

Player 2:

Left arrow, Right arrow = Movement

Right shift = Power

Up arrow = Jump

!!!R = Restart the game!!!

Note: You can't win the game I am working on it.

Please don't forget to give feedback after you test the game to help me developing

Have fun!
